Header: 141 Brigade Troops Join Fire Fighters to Douse Fire at Coconut Oil Mill
Content: Alert to a sudden outbreak of a fire in the coconut oil-producing 'Randeniya Virgin Mills' factory in Batepola, Gampaha area on Sunday (9), 141 Brigade troops, together with fire fighters in Gampaha rushed to the scene and brought it under control. 141 Brigade Commander on the instructions of Major General Mahinda Mudalige, Commander, Security Forces -West went to the scene and personally coordinated the emergency operation.
